title: unnaiyallAl uTratuNai
sahitya:
unnaiyallAl uTratuNai vEruNDO unnaiyE sharN aDaindEn uyya vazhi kANa


anupallavi

  mannu pugazh mA madurai mInAkSiyE manamirangi varamaruLavE


caraNam    Anai mukhanaiyum Arumukhanaiyum anbuDanE aNaikkum annaiyE shEi nAn
 avaniyil iniyum avadiyurAmalE AdarittaruL nin pAdAmbujam gatiyE
